title: Majestic Grays Ferry 3 bed 1 bath home with patio, W/D & more!
description:
1521 S Bailey – Available May 1st!
Discover an incredible 3 bedroom 1 bath fresh renovation located in the heart of Point Breeze neighborhood of South Philadelphia. This property is conveniently located steps away from public transit, highways, convenience stores, parks, grocery stores and more.
This 2 Story single family home comes equipped with 3 bedrooms 1 bathroom, a private patio, and an unfinished basement. The living/dining area located on the main level features brand new laminate flooring and tons of natural light within the open concept design. Proceed into the back kitchen which boasts stainless steel-full size appliances that are decked in brand new wooden cabinets and topped off with dark quartz counter tops, in other words, classy chic. Find your very own private patio through the kitchen is a door which is the perfect size for entertaining or BBQ-ing. Additional storage space and a full size washer and dryer can be found in the basement.
The second floor includes 3 bedrooms and a nifty 3 piece tiled bathroom with a bathtub.
Home boasts:
Central heat
Brand new Hardwood floors
Patio
Full basement
Full size appliances
Spacious bedrooms
Laundry
This home has it all, contact Bryan today to schedule a showing.

title: HUGE 1 Bed Fantastic Aprtmnt at THE SCHOOL ADMINISTRATION BUILDING
description:
Welcome to your new home in the iconic School Administration Building, a historic structure that has been beautifully converted into luxurious apartments. This huge 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment is the perfect combination of old-world charm and modern convenience, with all the amenities you could want in a living space.
As soon as you step inside, you'll be struck by the spacious and gracious feel of the apartment. With hardwood floors throughout and high ceilings, the living and dining space is open and airy, perfect for entertaining friends and family. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with granite countertops and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances that make cooking a pleasure. And with a washer/dryer in-unit, you'll never have to worry about making a trip to the laundromat again.
This is a doorman building with an elevator, so you can feel secure and comfortable in your new home. And with a fitness center right on-site, you'll have everything you need to stay fit and healthy without ever leaving the building. Plus, with Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, and so much more just steps away, you'll never run out of things to do or places to go.
If you need parking, don't worry - it's available for an additional fee. And while the pictures you see are of a model unit, you can rest assured that your apartment will be just as beautiful and spacious as the one in the photos.
This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to live in a truly unique and stunning space. Don't miss your chance to make this incredible apartment your new home. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and see why this could be the perfect place for you!

title: Studio Apartment, Clark Park/University City, FIRST MONTH FREE
description:
First month free! Studio Apartment 945$ a month.
So I signed a lease for another apartment (in another part of the city due to work) and am currently trying to move out of my current apartment.
The apartment is a studio space on the basement floor of the building. It’s at Chester Ave close to Clark Park, which is an approximately 25 min walk to Upenn and Drexel campuses, and has the trolly literally right outside which will take you to both campuses and center city in 10-15 mins. The bathroom is also roomy with a tub and shower. Both cats and dogs are allowed with an extra fee. The building also has a brand-new fitness center.
If you’re interested message me and i’ll share a video of the apartment.

title: Spacious 1 Bedroom with Parking and Large Yard
description:
Welcome to The Lawrence Street Condominiums, one of the original warehouse conversion buildings located in Olde Kensington and just steps from Northern Liberties and Fishtown! This boutique 10-unit building blends its industrial past with gorgeous condos and private PARKING in a securely gated lot.
Facing a clean, quiet, tree-lined block of North 4th Street, this building has all the charm that’s missing from most of the ubiquitous new construction popping up throughout the city. If you’re looking for a bright, spacious & unique space with such features as natural maple hardwood floors and a huge outdoor space, this is the one for you.
Designed with two large glass sliding doors that open up to a patio that’s perfect for all types of activities, this condo has tons of natural light and is walkable to all the exciting restaurants, shopping and bars in this vibrant and in-demand area of the city. The kitchen in this home has large cabinets, black stone counter tops and stainless steel appliances including gas cooking and an island for casual dining.
You won’t have to share your bathroom since the convenient half bath can serve guests while keeping the full bathroom private. Other amenities include recessed lighting, central air, washer & dryer and ceiling fans. Want to live (and park!) near such favorites as Mulherin’s, Middle Child, Cafe La Maude, ReAnimator Coffee, El Camino and so many more?

title: Lovely, bright & spacious Point Breeze 3 bed 1 bath home coming 6/1!
description:
2041 Dickinson St. Available June
Come out today and take a look at this beautiful three bedroom one bathroom house in the point breeze section of Philadelphia.
One step inside this house and you’re sure to fall in love.
As you enter the home you walk right into the living room with refinished hardwood floors. This room is large enough to have a living room and a full separate dining room with table and chairs. The kitchen is extremely efficient with all wood cabinets, a full-size refrigerator, and gas stove. Through the kitchen you can access the rear patio which has a small little space to plant flowers and or vegetables.
There is a full basement that is extremely clean and very dry. This basement is perfect for storage however there is also a full-size washer and dryer located there as well.
The second floor of this home has three incredibly spacious bedrooms and one three-piece tiled bathroom. All bedrooms have tall ceilings, wall to wall carpet, and great natural light. The bathroom is a three-piece tile bath with full-size tub.
All windows are double pane vinyl windows which leave cool in the summer and warm in the winter. This house is not to be missed.
Home features:
Beautiful hardwood floors
Full-size appliances including refrigerator and gas stove
Full-size basement with washer and dryer
Three large bedrooms all with new carpet
Great natural lights
Convenient location

title: Perfect move-in special to find your new place! - 222
description:
MOVE-IN SPECIAL: $600 Security Deposit for qualified applicants. Special based upon your approval/application. Only 1st month and security to move in, no last month's rent!
Make yourself at home with us!
Our beautiful Apartment 222 is located within the fully renovated Croydon Hall located in Walnut Hill. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment features amazing views with tons of light in addition to granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, spacious layouts, environmentally friendly PVC and tile flooring, self-controlled heating and cooling via PTAC unit, and bathrooms equipped with a rainfall showerhead, tying everything together with sleek, modern finishes you'll be sure to love.
Monthly Rent: $1,550.00
Application Fee: $50 per applicant
Square Footage: 610
Lease Term: Flexible - Please Enquire!
Included Utilities: Water, Sewer, Trash, Recycle
Tenant Pays: Electric, Cable/Internet
Schools: Henry C. Lea Elementary, West Philadelphia High School
Parking: Street Parking is Free
Storage: Indoor Storage Units Available for $24.99/month
Unique Features
- Loading Zone for all your shopping needs
- Secure Entry with FOB access
- Online Resident Portal
- Smoke-Free Building
- Conference Room
- Free Bicycle Storage and Free Air for bike tires
- Enclosed Community Courtyard with gazebo, firepit, lawn games and grill!
- Recreation Lounge with TV, Games, Vending Machines, Sharing Library & more
The Amenities
- Lobby Staffed 24/7 with Package Concierge
- Elevator Access on most floors
- Recently renovated 24 hour Laundry Room with card or mobile app payment
- Fully Equipped Fitness Center in Building, now with a Peleton!
- Playroom for the kiddies
Pet Policy
Pets are residents, too!
Two pets per apartment.
Breed & Weight restrictions apply*.
Non-refundable pet fee of $250/per pet with a $15 monthly fee/per pet.
The Community
- Within walking distance to Baltimore Ave., there are a number of cafes, restaurants, shops, co-ops, parks, community gardens, & even a tennis court in the neighborhood to enjoy!
- There are 2 bus stops within a block and a half (#42 & #21) and the MFL station is just a 10-15 minute stroll.
- Prefer to bike? We've got you covered with indoor bicycle racks, too!
Interested?
Property Management works on-site and is available M-F 9:30A-4:30P. Evening & weekend tours can be arranged with an agent as well. Need a virtual tour? We can do so if you have an iphone or ipad. Contact me today to schedule your private tour!
Don't see your move-in date?
Ask! We're sure to have something you'll love.
*All animals must be approved by management prior to move-in and during the course of residency.
Photos are of our model apartment.
Availability is subject to change rapidly, so contact us ASAP to schedule your private tour of our available floor plans!

description:

We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand

record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

title: 3 br / 3.5 bath townhouse w/2 parking; NEW construction
description: This 3 BR/3.5 BA beautiful townhouse features dramatic 10 ft high ceilings and incredible natural light throughout, ideal for today's modern lifestyle. The first floor boasts an open-plan living room, dining, half-bath, and a true chef's eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and white quartz countertops.  On the second floor you will find 2 spacious guest bedrooms, each with a large closet, big windows, and separate linen closets.  The second floor hosts a full bathroom and conveniently stacked large capacity laundry. Up to the Master Floor oasis featuring a spacious bedroom with walk-in closet. En-suite bathroom down the hall is complete with a step-in shower with transom window, frame-less glass doors and contemporary double vanity. In the rear of the Master Floor is a bonus room perfect for a home office/study/media with custom wet bar/wine refrigerator/sink. Ascend to the furnished-for-fun rooftop deck with tree top and sunset views.  Finished basement offers another large closet, an additional full bath, and utility room.  Dual zone thermostats control force hot air and central A/C.  2-car assigned parking off the rear door.  This is a truly exceptional home in convenient Mt Airy location. Easy access to transportation, Chestnut Hill, Center City, the suburbs and major highways.  This home comes unfurnished, furnished as-is, or any combination of the two.  All windows have cordless blinds; living room and bedroom windows also have floor to ceiling blackout curtains.  This rental would be perfect for a family, couple, or anyone looking for no-maintenance living just off historic Germantown Avenue.  The attached pics are from the original (staged) 2022 listing.  Contact me for current pics of furnished home or any additional information.

title: 4 Bedrooms Brand New Townhouse
description:
a brand new, spacious, and modern townhouse located in the Point Breeze area of South Philly 1525 Manton St. townhouse has four bedrooms, three full bathrooms, powder room and roof top deck making it a very roomy living space.
The open concept first floor boasts a spacious living room and dining area with high ceilings, as well as a kitchen with tall cabinets and Quartz countertops also built in cabinet a microwave oven, trash compactor, dishwasher, convection five burner gas stove oven, exhaust hood venting to outside and 36”Samsung’s refrigerator and many more . that opens up to a fenced backyard.
The sub-level bedroom is a large space with plenty of natural light, complete with a large closet with sliding mirror doors, a bathroom with a large bathtub, and a utility room with Carrier HVAC unit and tankless gas water heater.
Moving up to the second floor, there are two additional bedrooms with large closets and windows that share a bathroom with a huge glass wall shower. This level also includes a laundry room with a stacked LG washer and dryer, utility sink, and storage cabinet.
The master suite, located on the third floor, a wall-to-wall closet, with mirrors sliding doors. Additionally, there is a sitting room or office space with a walk-in closet. Climbing up the staircase to the beautiful rooftop deck, one can enjoy stunning views of the entire Center City skyline
.NO PETS - ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING. Maximum occupant 4
12 months lease with last months rent + 1 month deposit
$50.00 application and credit check, not refundable
